divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 2245 I was out walking dog and looked up, thought I was watching a satellite or space station But it last much to long heading easterly and a large aircraft was on the same heading flying several miles to the right. The UFO was a bright object much lower and brighter than your typical satellite and I watch move west to east for several minutes before clouds and horizon blocked my view.
Summary: First thought it to be space station but it lasted to long and a large aircraft followed it but to the right several miles away ... Same flight path
